Lyric:
[by:我坐在火山的最边缘]
[00:15.02]I thought that I've been hurt before 
[00:21.19]But no one's ever left me quite this sore 
[00:29.04]Your words cut deeper than a knife 
[00:35.11]Now I need someone to breathe me back to life 
[00:43.17]Got a feeing that I'm going under 
[00:46.57]But I know that I'll make it out alive 
[00:50.40]If I quit calling you my lover 
[00:53.80]Move on 
[00:55.48]You watch me bleed until I can't breathe shaking 
[01:00.42]Falling onto my knees 
[01:02.96]And now that I'm without your kisses 
[01:07.40]I'll be needing stitches 
[01:10.98]Tripping over myself aching 
[01:14.44]Begging you to come help 
[01:17.11]And now that I'm without your kisses 
[01:21.59]I'll be needing stitches 
[01:25.67]Just like a moth drawn to a flame 
[01:32.02]Oh you lured me in I couldn't sense the pain 
[01:39.78]Your bitter heart cold to the touch 
[01:46.02]Now I'm gonna reap what I sow 
[01:49.04]I'm left seeing red on my own 
[01:53.98]Got a feeing that I'm going under 
[01:57.46]But I know that I'll make it out alive 
[02:01.21]If I quit calling you my lover 
[02:04.50]Move on 
[02:06.38]You watch me bleed until I can't breathe shaking 
[02:11.19]Falling onto my knees 
[02:13.70]And now that I'm without your kisses 
[02:18.28]I'll be needing stitches 
[02:21.78]Tripping over myself aching 
[02:25.35]Begging you to come help 
[02:27.95]And now that I'm without your kisses 
[02:32.35]I'll be needing stitches Oh No
